item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Lets go outside to Quincy Quarries on Sat August 18th for top roping. Lets meet at 11am. If anyone needs a ride, email me or call me on my cell at 617 501-6217. Bring ropes and slings if you have them. You should know how to belay and have a harness with a carabiner and belay device.

Please bring a Helmut if you have one.
Also, there are no facilities. Bring water, food, sunscreen, camera, etc.

We will leave the parking lot area at 11:15am sharp. If you come afterwords, you will just have to walk around and ask for the Rock Climbing Boston Meetup. I will try to set up on the C-Wall, but if its really crowded, I may choose the J-Wall or S-Wall or another wall. For those not familiar with the Quarries, they have several walls or cliffs labeled A through S. Each wall contains several climbing routes.

If the weather looks really bad for Sunday, I will send an email out Saturday Night, and we will meet at Metrorock. Otherwise assume we will be at the Quarries.

Directions:
The Quincy Quarries Reservation is part of the Blue Hills Reservation, south of Boston. Take Route 93/3 to exit 8 in Quincy. Follow signs for Quarry Hills Recreation Complex until you come to Ricciuti Drive, between a Mr. Tux and a large Quarry Hills sign. It's quick going south, but a bit roundabout going north. Turn right on Ricciuti Drive. There is a small parking lot on your right (which is usually full and you will most likely see a line of cars on the opposite side of road where you can park).

See ya,
Geoff
item.name: Top Roping at Quincy Quarries Saturday
